Why should you use python ?

  • Software quality
  • Developer productivity
  • Program portability
  • Enjoyment

–

  • Google makes extensive use of Python in its web search systems.
  • The popular YouTube video sharing service is largely written in Python.
  • The Dropbox storage service codes both its server and desktop client software pri- marily in Python.
  • The Raspberry Pi single-board computer promotes Python as its educational lan- guage.
  • EVE Online, a massively multiplayer online game (MMOG) by CCP Games, uses Python broadly.
  • The widespread BitTorrent peer-to-peer file sharing system began its life as a Python program.

What should you know about python.
